projects.title: HubDocs
projects.description: HubDocs is a powerful tool for exploring and documenting SignalR hubs in your ASP.NET Core applications. It provides a beautiful, Swagger-like UI that automatically discovers and displays all your SignalR hubs and their methods.

projects.title: TBC Bank - Exchange Rate offer
projects.description: A portal enabling customers to request specific exchange rates, with automated and manual validation across web, mobile, and branch channels.

projects.title: TBC Bank - Rate Engine
projects.description: Build rate engine, to manage exchange, commercial, individual rates.Optimized the performance of it to reliably handle high-volume financial transactions.

projects.title: TBC Bank - Jira API Automation Tool
projects.description: A tool to auto-create and track Jira tasks, improving project management efficiency across departments.

projects.title: TBC Bank - Company Libraries
projects.description: Contributed to reusable internal libraries, including the implementation of a RabbitMQ idempotency checker and common templates, improving standardization and efficiency across multiple projects.

projects.title: .Net Template
projects.description: MB.Template â€“ Clean Architecture for .NET. A Clean Architecture solution template for .NET projects. This template includes all key layers to help you start building scalable applications faster: API, Application, Domain, Infrastructure, and Persistence.

projects.title: NotifyHub
projects.description: NotifyHub is a real-time notification system built with ASP.NET Core and SignalR, designed to provide efficient and scalable group-based notifications. It's perfect for applications that need to send targeted notifications to specific user groups or roles.

projects.title: Common.Repository
projects.description: Common repository and unit of work pattern for .NET projects.
